price: Baranavuga bati “Ese iryo sezerano (izuka) rizaba ryari, niba koko muri abanyakuri?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
